name: Poly Roller
description:
Control the ball with A and D or arrow keys.

There are three types of barrels: one that explodes, one that turns the ground into ice, and one that splits the ground into pieces.

Use these to your advantage and detonate them to avoid red blocks that kill you! These can be detonated with the keys, Q, W, or E. It's random each time!

Also, try not to fall off!

There are boost pads along the way, that constantly speed you up.

Try to get on the leaderboard!

Good luck!
